contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox UK place | country = England | latitude = 54.03109 | longitude = -1.68853 | official_name = Darley | static_image = | static_image_caption = | population = | civil_parish = [[Menwith with Darley]] | shire_district = [[Harrogate (borough)|Harrogate]] | shire_county = [[North Yorkshire]] | region = Yorkshire and the Humber | constituency_westminster = | post_town = HARROGATE | postcode_district = HG3 | postcode_area = HG | dial_code = | os_grid_reference = SE205595 }} '''Darley''' is a straggling village in the middle of [[Nidderdale]] in the [[Harrogate (borough)|Harrogate]] district of [[North Yorkshire]], [[England]] which has won many local and national '[[Britain in Bloom]]' awards. A popular attraction in Darley is the Darley Mill Centre. Darley has one pub - the Wellington Inn - a popular place for both locals and visitors to the area or even those passing through. [[Historic counties of England|Historically]] part of the [[West Riding of Yorkshire]], its westernmost end is '''Darley Head'''. [[File:Waterwheel, Darley Head.jpg|thumb|left|Waterwheel at the Darley [[Watermill|Mill]] Centre]] {{clearleft}} == External links == {{Commons category|Darley, North Yorkshire}} *[http://www.darleyvillage.org/ Village website] *[http://www.darleycommunity.org/ Village & community website] *[http://www.thechurchinthedale.com/church/christ-church-darley/ Darley Christ Church] *[http://www.darleymill.com/ Darley Mill - a restored watermill in the village] *[http://www.darleymill.com/ Days out North Yorkshire] *{{oscoor gbx|SE205595}} [[Category:Villages in North Yorkshire]] [[Category:Nidderdale]] {{harrogate-geo-stub}}
